SELECT * FROM sys_permission WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND ( permission_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR permission_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY create_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND rp.is_deleted = 0 AND rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.create_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND rp.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.create_at DESC
